title: Perveillance
description: Troubling content abounds in today's startling sequel. If you dare to click, know this: your perversion will be registered at the highest level.
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: Troubling content abounds in today's startling sequel. If you dare to click, know this: your perversion will be registered at the highest level. #Fridabe is mostly about the two of us trying to become professional Bazaar players - by which I mean Bazaar, the best game you aren't playing. I can say this with the utmost confidence. We're gonna get started a little after ten and go for a few hours, so you can get a sense of what I'm talking about. See you then. (CW)TB out.
html:
Troubling content abounds in today's startling sequel. If you dare to click, know this: your perversion will be registered at the highest level.

#Fridabe is mostly about the two of us trying to become professional Bazaar players - by which I mean Bazaar, the best game you aren't playing. I can say this with the utmost confidence. We're gonna get started a little after ten and go for a few hours, so you can get a sense of what I'm talking about. See you then.

(CW)TB out.
